entry.title: 两次失败的面试经历
Aircrack-ng抓取握手包
entry.content:
准备工作

service network-manager stop
airmon-ng check kill

开启网卡监听

//开启监听模式

airmon-ng start wlan0

//查看是否开启监听模式

iwconfig
airodump-ng wlan0mon
airodump-ng wlan0mon --bssid AC:C1:EE:36:15:1D -c 1 -w hongmishouji
aireplay-ng -0 2 -a AC:C1:EE:36:15:1D -c 30:B4:9E:5A:96:B2 wlan0mon

暴力破解

aircrack-ng -w /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt wpa2-02.cap

entry.title: Android安全学习导航
entry.content:
《教我兄弟学Android逆向》系列课程

原贴导航

  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向01 编写第一个Android程序》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向02 破解第一个Android程序》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向03 破解第一个Android游戏》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向04 动态调试smali代码》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向05 在smali代码中插入Log》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向06 用AndroidStudio编写第一个so》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向07 IDA破解第一个so》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向08 IDA爆破签名验证》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向09 IDA动态破解登陆验证》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向10 静态分析反调试apk》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向11 动态调试init_array》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向12 编写xpose模块》  

番外篇

  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向番外01 apktool的使用》  
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向番外02 jeb工具的使用》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向番外03 Android逆向必会命令》
  • 《教我兄弟学Android逆向番外04 OLLVM混淆环境搭建》

教程附件

链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1x0pNcso7TCWMFDZr8AcsIA 密码：ndd0

《FRIDA系列文章》

环境准备和入门篇

  • Android环境准备：谷歌原版镜像8.1、TWRP、Magisk root
  • 一篇文章带你领悟frida的精髓（基于安卓8.1）

FRIDA脚本篇

  • FRIDA脚本系列（一）入门篇：在安卓8.1上dump蓝牙接口和实例
  • FRIDA脚本系列（二）成长篇：动静态结合逆向WhatsApp
  • FRIDA脚本系列（三）超神篇：百度AI“调教”抖音AI
  • FRIDA脚本系列（四）更新篇：几个主要机制的大更新

FRIDA API篇

  • FRIDA-API使用篇：rpc、Process、Module、Memory使用方法及示例
  • FRIDA-API使用篇：Java、Interceptor、NativePointer(Function/Callback)使用方法及示例
  • Frida Java Hook 详解（安卓9）：代码及示例（上）
  • Frida Java Hook 详解（安卓9）：代码及示例（下）

实用FRIDA篇

  • 实用FRIDA进阶：内存漫游、hook anywhere、抓包
  • 实用FRIDA进阶：脱壳、自动化、实用问题集锦
  • 03.实用FRIDA进阶：主动调用，密码克星

《FART系列文章》

源码系列

  • 2020年安卓源码编译指南及FART脱壳机谷歌全设备镜像发布
  • FART源码解析及编译镜像支持到Pixel2(xl) （链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1zAYliYbkagdUUsykww_L4g 提取码：vv5u）
  • XPOSED魔改一：获取特征

Kali Linux虚拟机下载种子在FART/文件夹中

OPPOSRC：来自高纬的对抗系列

  • 来自高纬的对抗①：定制ART解释器脱所有一二代壳 （附件）
  • 来自高纬的对抗②：魔改XPOSED过框架检测(上)
  • 来自高纬的对抗③：魔改XPOSED过框架检测(下) （附件1、 附件2）
  • 来自高纬的对抗④：定制安卓内核过反调试 （附件:链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1zAYliYbkagdUUsykww_L4g 提取码：vv5u]）
  • 来自高纬的对抗⑤：替换安卓内核并解封Linux命令和环境 （附件）

进击的Coder：精品连载

  • 安卓 App 逆向课程一之环境配置
  • 精品连载丨安卓 App 逆向课程之二逆向神器 frida 的介绍
  • 精品连载丨安卓 App 逆向课程之三 frida 注入 Okhttp 抓包上篇
  • 精品连载丨安卓 App 逆向课程之四 frida 注入 Okhttp 抓包中篇
  • 精品连载丨安卓 App 逆向课程之五 frida 注入 Okhttp 抓包下篇

entry.title: Linux日常使用配置
entry.content:
配置zsh

安装 oh-my-zsh

sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)"

安装插件

zsh-autosuggestions

git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions.git ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions

zsh-syntax-highlighting

git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting

autojump

apt install autojump

修改zsh配置

vi ~/.zshrc

plugins=(git)
plugins=(git autojump zsh-autosuggestions zsh-syntax-highlighting)

另外
ZSH_THEME="robbyrussell"可修改主题

DISABLE_MAGIC_FUNCTIONS="true"关闭url转义

安装软件

虚拟机

VMWare Workstation
VirtualBox

模拟器

Genymotion

编辑器

Atom
VScode
Sublime Text
Typora

开发工具

Android Studio

PyCharm专业版 社区版
GoLand
CLion
PhpStorm
IntelliJ IDEA旗舰版 社区版 教育版

通讯工具

Telegram

国产软件

网易云音乐
百度网盘
百度输入法
搜狗输入法
QQ for Linux

安装AWVS

AWVS下载

修改pypi源

mkdir ~/.pip && \nano ~/.pip/pip.conf

添加以下内容

[global]index-url = https://mirrors.aliyun.com/pypi/simple/[install]trusted-host=mirrors.aliyun.com

修改docker源

sudo mkdir -p /etc/docker
sudo tee /etc/docker/daemon.json <<-'EOF' { "registry-mirrors": ["https://ejyq8fp4.mirror.aliyuncs.com"] } EOF
sudo systemctl daemon-reload 
sudo systemctl restart docker

entry.title: 将Termux改造成移动测试工具箱
entry.content:
简介

根文件系统$PREFIX：/data/data/com.termux/files/usr
家目录$HOME：/data/data/com.termux/files/home

切换国内源

Termux镜像源

sed -i 's@^\(deb.*stable main\)$@#\1
deb https://mirror.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/termux/termux-packages-24 stable main@' $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list
sed -i 's@^\(deb.*games stable\)$@#\1
deb https://mirror.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/termux/game-packages-24 games stable@' $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list.d/game.list
sed -i 's@^\(deb.*science stable\)$@#\1
deb https://mirror.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/termux/science-packages-24 science stable@' $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list.d/science.list

社区源

root-repo

sed -i 's@^\(deb.*root stable\)$@#\1
deb https://mirror.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/termux/termux-root-packages-24 root stable@' $PREFIX/etc/apt/root.list

x11-repo

sed -i 's@^\(deb.*x11 main\)$@#\1
deb https://mirror.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/termux/x11-packages x11 main@' $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list.d/x11.list

unstable-repo

sed -i 's@^\(deb.*unstable main\)$@#\1
deb https://mirror.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/termux/unstable-packages unstable main@' $PREFIX/etc/apt/sources.list.d/unstable.list

修改提示语

修改文件时建议先备份源文件

cd $PREFIX/etc/ && mv motd motd.bak

bash终端

直接修改$PREFIX/etc/motd文件

vi $PREFIX/etc/motd

将内容替换成

zsh终端

如果像bash终端环境一样设置问候语会显示两遍

screenfetch

安装工具

nmap

pkg install nmap

Sqlmap

// 安装python3

pkg install python

// 克隆sqlmap仓库

git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/sqlmapproject/sqlmap.git sqlmap-dev

Routesploit

// 克隆soutesploit仓库

git clone https://www.github.com/threat9/routersploit.git

// 安装依赖

python -m pip install -r requirements.txt

// 启动Routesploit

python rsf.py

Metasploit-Framework

// 添加unstable-repo源并更新缓存

pkg install unstable-repe && pkg update

// 安装Metasploit

pkg install metasploit

启动Postgresql数据库

pg_ctl -D /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/var/lib/postgresql -l logfile start

运行Metasploit

msfconsole

Proxmark3

entry.title: linux+windows双系统的问题解决
entry.content:
引导丢失

Windows更新后有时把Linux的引导EFI删了，BIOS中也看不到选项，可以在Linux启动盘下用efibootmgr新建一个

efibootmgr -c -w -L "Kali Linux" -d /dev/sda -p 1 -l \\EFI\\kali\\grubx64.efi

时钟变慢

timedatectl set-local-rtc 1 --adjust-system-clock

共享蓝牙设备

双系统切换系统后另一个系统蓝牙键盘连接不上，只能重新配对
原因是两个系统蓝牙设备配对成功后保存的key不同
解决办法就是让两个系统的key保持一致

0x01 linux连接设备

打开bluetoothctl

# 扫描蓝牙设备，查看设备Mac地址scan on# 获得Mac地址后关闭扫描scan off# 配对设备pair 34:88:5D:98:5B:8E# 连接设备connect 34:88:5D:98:5B:8E# 将设备添加到信任trust 34:88:5D:98:5B:8E# 查看已连接设备devices

0x02 windows连接设备

配对后

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Services\BTHPORT\Parameters\Keys\电脑蓝牙MAC地址

P.S. 貌似不能复制

0x03 修改linux文件

debian系的linux保存的Key一般在这个文件/var/lib/bluetooth/电脑蓝牙MAC地址/设备蓝牙MAC地址/info

vi /var/lib/bluetooth/00:DB:DF:6B:F0:FC/34:88:5D:98:5B:8E/info

将[LinkKey]下的Key值替换成windows注册表下的那个二机制值

entry.title: deepin-wine的安装与使用
entry.content:
环境安装

wget -O- https://deepin-wine.im.dev/setup.sh | SH

软件安装

deepin.com.95579.cjsc  // 金长江网上交易财智版deepin.com.aaa-logo  // SWGSoft AAALogodeepin.com.baidu.pan  // 百度网盘deepin.com.cmbchina  // 招行网银专业版deepin.com.foxmail  // Foxmaildeepin.com.gtja.fuyi  // 国泰君安证券富易deepin.com.qq.b.crm  // 营销QQdeepin.com.qq.b.eim  // 企业QQdeepin.com.qq.im  // QQdeepin.com.qq.im.light  // QQ轻聊版deepin.com.qq.office  // TIMdeepin.com.qq.rtx2015  // 腾讯通RTX2015deepin.com.taobao.aliclient.qianniu  // 千牛deepin.com.taobao.wangwang  // 阿里旺旺deepin.com.thunderspeed  // 迅雷极速版deepin.com.wechat  // 微信deepin.com.weixin.work  // 企业微信

使用问题

QQ/TIM 无法显示头像、图片以及下载文件的解决方法

方法1

// 安装privoxy  

apt install privoxy

// 开启privoxy服务 

service privoxy start

将QQ/TIM代理设置为 127.0.0.1:8118  

// 开机启动privoxy服务 

systemctl enable privoxy.service

可以修改/etc/privoxy/config文件更换端口 

listen-address  127.0.0.1:8118listen-address  [::1]:8118

方法2

sudo sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6=1 \sudo sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6=1 \sudo sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.lo.disable_ipv6=1

微信提示版本过低

wget https://dldir1.qq.com/weixin/Windows/WeChatSetup.exe \env WINEPREFIX=~/.deepinwine/Deepin-WeChat deepin-wine WeChatSetup.exe

参考

zq1997/deepin-wine
封装deepin-wine应用

entry.title: Veil安装失败的解决方法
entry.content:
github或pip网络不稳定导致安装中断

解决方法

指定git仓库

打开veil目录下config文件夹中的setup.sh文件，kali下为/usr/share/veil/config/setup.sh（以下统称setup.sh文件）

找到sudo git clone https://github.com/Veil-Framework/VeilDependencies.git "${dependenciesdir}"

将其改成自己转存国内仓库的地址 

sudo git clone https://gitee.com/cnlnn/VeilDependencies.git "${dependenciesdir}"

指定pip源

打开setup.sh文件  
找到sudo -u "${trueuser}" WINEPREFIX="${winedir}" wine "${winedir}/drive_c/Python34/python.exe" "-m" "pip" "install"

在其各行末添加国内源，例如清华镜像源

 "-i" "https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/pypi/web/simple/"

中文编码导致pip install中断

安装过程报错

OSError: [Errno 22] Invalid argument
Exception ignored in: <_io.TextIOWrapper name=’‘ mode=’w’ encoding=’cp936’>

veil安装错误代码

Failed to run (wine) Python pip… Exit code: 2
Failed to run (wine) Python pip future… Exit code: 2
Failed to run (wine) Python pip pefile… Exit code: 2

解决方法

切换到英文环境下安装，暂时没想到别的方法。。。

python版本过低导致无法安装

安装过程报错

RuntimeError: Python 3.5 or later is required

veil安装错误代码

[ERROR] Failed to run (wine) Python pip future … Exit code:1
[ERROR] Failed to run (wine) Python pip pefile … Exit code:1

解决方法

1. 指定版本号(推荐)

官方解决方法是指定版本号

打开setup.sh文件

将sudo -u "${trueuser}" WINEPREFIX="${winedir}" wine "${winedir}/drive_c/Python34/python.exe" "-m" "pip" "install" "--upgrade"

修改成

sudo -u "${trueuser}" WINEPREFIX="${winedir}" wine "${winedir}/drive_c/Python34/python.exe" "-m" "pip" "install" "--upgrade" "pip==19.1.*"

2. 更换安装顺序

脚本默认安装顺序
pip install –upgrade pip –> pip install future –> pip install pefile

改成pip install future –> pip install pefile –> pip install –upgrade pip

  echo -e "

 [*] ${YELLOW}Installing (Wine) Python's PIP pefile${RESET}
"  sudo -u "${trueuser}" WINEPREFIX="${winedir}" wine "${winedir}/drive_c/Python34/python.exe" "-m" "pip" "install" "future"  tmp="$?"  if [[ "${tmp}" -ne "0" ]]; then    msg="Failed to run (wine) Python pip future... Exit code: ${tmp}"    errors="${errors}
${msg}"    echo -e " ${RED}[ERROR] ${msg}${RESET}
"  fi  sudo -u "${trueuser}" WINEPREFIX="${winedir}" wine "${winedir}/drive_c/Python34/python.exe" "-m" "pip" "install" "pefile"  tmp="$?"  if [[ "${tmp}" -ne "0" ]]; then    msg="Failed to run (wine) Python pip pefile... Exit code: ${tmp}"    errors="${errors}
${msg}"    echo -e " ${RED}[ERROR] ${msg}${RESET}
"  fi  sudo -u "${trueuser}" WINEPREFIX="${winedir}" wine "${winedir}/drive_c/Python34/python.exe" "-m" "pip" "install" "--upgrade" "pip"  tmp="$?"  if [[ "${tmp}" -ne "0" ]]; then    msg="Failed to run (wine) Python pip... Exit code: ${tmp}"    errors="${errors}
${msg}"    echo -e " ${RED}[ERROR] ${msg}${RESET}
"  fi

entry.title: Proxmark3使用帮助
entry.content:
连接电脑

官方

Windows

Linux

克隆 proxmark3 库

git clone https://github.com/proxmark/proxmark3.git

发行版安装依赖
Kali Linuxsudo apt install git build-essential libreadline5 libreadline-dev gcc-arm-none-eabi libusb-0.1-4 libusb-dev libqt4-dev ncurses-dev perl pkg-config libpcsclite-dev pcscd
Ubuntusudo apt install p7zip git build-essential libreadline5 libreadline-dev libusb-0.1-4 libusb-dev libqt4-dev perl pkg-config wget libncurses5-dev gcc-arm-none-eabi libstdc++-arm-none-eabi-newlib libpcsclite-dev pcscd
Gentoo Linux sudo emerge git p7zip make gcc readline dev-libs/libusb perl wget dev-qt/qt-meta:4 sys-apps/pcsc-lite
openSUSEsudo zypper install -t pattern devel_basis
sudo zypper install git libreadline7 libusb-1_0-0 libusb-1_0-devel perl libqt4-devel readline7-devel termcap wget pcsc-lite

冰人

Windows

详见Windows安装说明

Linux

克隆 RRG/proxmark3 库

git clone https://github.com/RfidResearchGroup/proxmark3.git

发行版安装依赖蓝牙支持（rdv4）图形组件（hw tune）
Debiansudo apt-get install --no-install-recommends git ca-certificates build-essential pkg-config libreadline-dev gcc-arm-none-eabi libnewlib-dev qtbase5-dev libbz2-dev libbluetooth-devlibbluetooth-devqtbase5-dev
ArchLinuxsudo pacman -Sy git base-devel readline bzip2 arm-none-eabi-gcc arm-none-eabi-newlib qt5-base bluez --neededbluezqt5-base
Ferdorasudo dnf install git make gcc gcc-c++ arm-none-eabi-gcc-cs arm-none-eabi-newlib readline-devel bzip2-devel qt5-qtbase-devel bluez-libs-devel libatomicbluez-libs-develqt5-qtbase-devel
OpenSUSEsudo zypper install git patterns-devel-base-devel_basis gcc-c++ readline-devel libbz2-devel cross-arm-none-gcc9 cross-arm-none-newlib-devel libqt5-qtbase-devel不提供libqt5-qtbase-devel

根据自己的PM3平台进行判断

如果使用的是rdv4
可以直接编译make clean && make all
也可以自己指定平台为PM3RDV4进行编译make clean && make all PLATFORM=PM3RDV4

其他平台（例如我用的proxmark3 easy）  
则指定平台为PM3OTHER进行编译
make clean && make all PLATFORM=PM3OTHER

需要具体调整固件的可以查看高级编译参数

连接安卓手机

都只能够用冰人固件

Termux

Termux安装地址：
谷歌商店
酷安市场

通过源安装

pkg install proxmark3

虽然方便但常常会因为版本与自己编译的固件不一样而出现以下报错

$ sudo proxmark3 /dev/ttyACM0
[=] Session log /data/data/com.termux/files/home/.suroot/.proxmark3/log_20200815.txt
[=] Loading Preferences…
[+] loaded from JSON file /data/data/com.termux/files/home/.suroot/.proxmark3/preferences.json
[=] Using UART port /dev/ttyACM0
[!!] 🚨 Capabilities structure version sent by Proxmark3 is not the same as the one used by the client!
[!!] 🚨 Please flash the Proxmark with the same version as the client.
[!!] 🚨 ERROR: cannot communicate with the Proxmark

自行编译

安装依赖

pkg install make clang clang++ readline libc++ git

克隆 RRG/proxmark3 库

git clone https://github.com/RfidResearchGroup/proxmark3.git

只编译客户端

cd proxmark3 && make clean && make client
有root权限  

在Termux安装tsu 

pkg install tsu

sudo client/proxmark3 /dev/ttyACM0 //

无root权限

安装TCPUART

从上往下

USB_USRT
点击Connect
弹窗“要允许TCPUART访问proxmark3吗”点确定

TCP
切换 client -> server
修改端口（默认8080）
点击Start  

然后Termux处输入

client/proxmark3 tcp:localhost:端口

RFID Tools

RFID Tools安装地址：
谷歌商店
酷安市场

自带Termux环境，免root

官方固件命令使用帮助

hw 硬件检测相关命令

命令解释
detectreader[‘l’|’h’] – Detect external reader field (使用选项 ‘l’ 或 ‘h’ 来限制 低频 或 高频)
fpgaoffSet FPGA off
lcd<HEX command> <count> – Send command/data to LCD
lcdresetHardware reset LCD
readmem[address] – Read memory at decimal address from flash
resetReset the Proxmark3
setlfdivisor<19 - 255> – Drive LF antenna at 12Mhz/(divisor+1)
setmux<loraw|hiraw|lopkd|hipkd> – Set the ADC mux to a specific value
tune[‘l’|’h’] – 测量天线调谐 (使用选项 ‘l’ 或 ‘h’ 来限制 低频 或 高频)
versionShow version information about the connected Proxmark
statusShow runtime status information about the connected Proxmark
ping测试pm3是否有响应

hw tune //测量天线调谐

hw version //显示Proxmark3的固件版本

hf 高频相关命令

命令解释
14aISO14443A RFIDs…
14bISO14443B RFIDs…
15ISO15693 RFIDs…
epa德国身份证…
emvEMV cards…
legicLEGIC RFIDs…
iclassICLASS RFIDs…
mfMIFARE RFIDs…
mfuMIFARE Ultralight RFIDs…
topazTOPAZ (NFC Type 1) RFIDs…
tuneContinuously measure HF antenna tuning
listList protocol data in trace buffer
searchSearch for known HF tags [preliminary]
snoop<samples to skip (10000)> <triggers to skip (1)> Generic HF Snoop

hf 14a （ISO14443A卡）

命令解释
list[Deprecated] List ISO 14443a history
readerStart acting like an ISO14443 Type A reader
infoReads card and shows information about it
cuids<n> Collect n>0 ISO14443 Type A UIDs in one go
sim<UID> – Simulate ISO 14443a tag
snoopEavesdrop ISO 14443 Type A
apduSend an ISO 7816-4 APDU via ISO 14443-4 block transmission protocol
rawSend raw hex data to tag

hf 14a re // 等同hf 14a read

hf 14b （ISO14443B卡）

命令解释
infoFind and print details about a 14443B tag
list[Deprecated] List ISO 14443B history
readerAct as a 14443B reader to identify a tag
simFake ISO 14443B tag
snoopEavesdrop ISO 14443B
sri512readRead contents of a SRI512 tag
srix4kreadRead contents of a SRIX4K tag
sriwriteWrite data to a SRI512 | SRIX4K tag
rawSend raw hex data to tag

hf 15 （ISO15693卡）

命令解释
demodDemodulate ISO15693 from tag
readRead HF tag (ISO 15693)
recordRecord Samples (ISO 15693)
readerAct like an ISO15693 reader
simFake an ISO15693 tag
cmdSend direct commands to ISO15693 tag
findafiBrute force AFI of an ISO15693 tag
dumpmemoryRead all memory pages of an ISO15693 tag

hf mf （MIFARE卡）

命令解释
dbgSet default debug mode
rdblRead MIFARE classic block
rdscRead MIFARE classic sector
dumpDump MIFARE classic tag to binary file
restoreRestore MIFARE classic binary file to BLANK tag
wrblWrite MIFARE classic block
chkTest block keys
mifareRead parity error messages.
hardnestedNested attack for hardened Mifare cards
nestedTest nested authentication
sniffSniff card-reader communication
simSimulate MIFARE card
eclrClear simulator memory block
egetGet simulator memory block
esetSet simulator memory block
eloadLoad from file emul dump
esaveSave to file emul dump
ecfillFill simulator memory with help of keys from simulator
ekeyprnPrint keys from simulator memory
cwipeWipe magic Chinese card
csetuidSet UID for magic Chinese card
csetblkWrite block - Magic Chinese card
cgetblkRead block - Magic Chinese card
cgetscRead sector - Magic Chinese card
cloadLoad dump into magic Chinese card
csaveSave dump from magic Chinese card into file or emulator
decrypt[nt] [ar_enc] [at_enc] [data] - to decrypt snoop or trace

hf mf chk *1 ? t

hf mf mifare

hf mf nested 1 0 A ffffffffffff

hf mf nested 1 0 A ffffffffffff d

lf 低频相关命令

命令解释
awidAWID RFIDs…
cotagCOTAG CHIPs…
emEM4X CHIPs & RFIDs…
fdxFDX-B RFIDs…
gproxiiG Prox II RFIDs…
hidHID RFIDs…
hitagHitag CHIPs…
ioioProx RFIDs…
indalaIndala RFIDs…
jablotronJablotron RFIDs…
nexwatchNexWatch RFIDs…
noralsyNoralsy RFIDs…
pacPAC/Stanley RFIDs…
paradoxParadox RFIDs…
prescoPresco RFIDs…
pcf7931PCF7931 CHIPs…
pyramidFarpointe/Pyramid RFIDs…
securakeySecurakey RFIDs…
t55xxT55xx CHIPs…
tiTI CHIPs…
vikingViking RFIDs…
visa2000Visa2000 RFIDs…
cmdread<d period> <z period> <o period> <c command> [‘H’] – Modulate LF reader field to send command before read (all periods in microseconds) (option ‘H’ for 134)
configSet config for LF sampling, bit/sample, decimation, frequency
flexdemodDemodulate samples for FlexPass
read[‘s’ silent] Read 125/134 kHz LF ID-only tag. Do ‘lf read h’ for help
search[offline] [‘u’] Read and Search for valid known tag (in offline mode it you can load first then search) - ‘u’ to search for unknown tags
sim[GAP] – Simulate LF tag from buffer with optional GAP (in microseconds)
simask[clock] [invert <1|0>] [biphase/manchester/raw <’b’|’m’|’r’>] [msg separator ‘s’] [d <hexdata>] – Simulate LF ASK tag from demodbuffer or input
simfsk[c <clock>] [i] [H <fcHigh>] [L <fcLow>] [d <hexdata>] – Simulate LF FSK tag from demodbuffer or input
simpsk[1|2|3] [c <clock>] [i] [r <carrier>] [d <raw hex to sim>] – Simulate LF PSK tag from demodbuffer or input
simbidirSimulate LF tag (with bidirectional data transmission between reader and tag)
snoop[‘l’|’h’|<divisor>] [trigger threshold]– Snoop LF (l:125khz, h:134khz)
vchdemod[‘clone’] – Demodulate samples for VeriChip

相关链接
